Jan. 2020
Design Trand
Georges Hobeika Autumn and Winter Series Lace

The moment I was about to buy a wedding dress at the age of 21, I was looking for another wardrobe, and I hope that this dress will make me cherish that moment forever.

Beautiful Lines of Outstanding Women

This season tailors the beautiful lines of outstanding women, and gives the image of women who love fashion. This is achieved through exquisite embroidery, such as owls made with colorful embroidery threads, which are perfectly integrated into other designs. The work also features simple fabric or large color patchwork, attractive cuts, lace details, high slits and a shoulderless design.Button Description
